title: Sam Altman got exceptionally testy over Claude Super Bowl ads
description: He posted a novella-sized rant that devolved into to calling his rival "dishonest" and "authoritarian."
content: He posted a novella-sized rant that devolved into to calling his rival "dishonest" and "authoritarian."
